Bibliographic References: Ex Basel Market, M u M , Auktion 56, 19 Feb. 1980, no. 119, pi. 55, 4—5; Schauenburg, loc. cit, p. 163, fig. 4.
Imagery Description: Dionysos riding on a winged griffin to right, preceded by a phlyax with a torch and followed by a papposilen; above—bird in window. Exergue—nude youth crawling on all fours to left.
